p: In the District Court of the first Judicial District
Charles R Gahres and Martha J Gahres, Plffs
WH Barrett and Isabella Sutton Defts
To WH Barrett and Isabella Sutton Defendants of W A George and N T Caton their Attorneys

You will please take notice that the plaintiffs in the above entitled action hereby appeals to the supreme court of this territory from the order of order entered in above entitled action in the said District Court on the 12th day ofJuly 1871 awarding the custody of Etta Dora Cravens to Defts and also the Judgement entered at some time in said action in favor of Defendants in said action and against Plaintiffs and from the whole thereof
